title: This animation is a cure to my eyes
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5nzeQ-vHF34


holy moly i watched like 5 times by now :O this animation is impressive , will we have a short for every champion or just some of them and will there be gangplank ?

replies.body:
I just want something for every region.

We got Bilgewater with MF
Ionia got Zed
Now Darius will represent Noxus

Inb4 we get Mordekaiser for the Shadow Isles :^)
Why not Sion for Noxus?

Because Darius is arguable THE Noxian posterboy at this point.

And he has already been revealed to be the next animation
Wait, where?!
right here bb http://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/collection/animation-workshop/
I vote lissandra for freljord so we can see how the animations handle magic {{champion:127}}

i want a refund, obviously my boy {{champion:6}} deserves the title

imagine the 10 second animation...

A lone warrior, venturing out in a dark place, and gets hit by a Coke can, it then explodes into a green mist. he then gets hit by a big needle...then a hundred more in a span on 2-3 seconds. he flops on the ground dead, to then be struck by lightning..._**BOOOM**_

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=oBWkhBsG,comment-id=0000000100010000,timestamp=2017-05-17T18:16:55.612+0000)
>
> Wait, where?!

00:26
There was a link in the Nexus article from yesterday that led to the Zed animation, and below that is the Darius animation titled "Fear".
Saw. Interested.

On the Universe page.

https://www2.pic-upload.de/img/33185231/darius.jpg
That too.
Well I can work with Darius.
good idea there but darius seems more dynamic than sion  just my opinion

For Shadow Isles it'll most likely be Thresh or Elise.
Demacia is anyone's fair game except for Galio.
Freljord might be Ashe or Olaf.

Shurima is a tough one, but maybe Sivir.
i hope Azir is the shurima one

I hope elise, reading her lore or that "experience" with that man would make a pretty bone chilling animation. 

Although Lucian might be likely too, since it could show him and his wife gunning down the isles and how she gets captured by thresh.
Actually yeah, Lucian would be fitting.

> [{quoted}](name=Malicious Metal,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=oBWkhBsG,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-17T17:54:04.549+0000)

> Ionia got Zed
> Now Darius will represent Noxus

> Inb4 we get Mordekaiser for the Shadow Isles :^)

Lets be honest , (sadly) Thresh and Hecarim are the ones to aways get the spotlight when it comes to the Shadow Isles.
A {{champion:90}} vs {{champion:38}} would be really good for the void.

Teemo Yordles and  Xin zhao for demacia 

Kha zix for Void , Rengar for  vastayan dudes ,
{{champion:86}} for demaci because garen is demacia.
Piltover better have Piltover's Finest but I'm guessing it's either Jayce or Ezreal by the looks how it's just one champ per region.

We totally need a rengar vs. kha'zix animation. 

Or maybe even a diana vs. leona now that I think about it.

Shurima {{champion:75}} 

Frejlord {{champion:22}} ? {{champion:201}} ?
Damn I was hoping that they'd do one for swain since even though Darius is the most iconic Noxus Champ. Swain is arguably the most important.

Well then there are Plague jungles, hur hur hur

(If they are still canon)

> [{quoted}](name=Barrel Simulator,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=oBWkhBsG,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-05-17T17:47:42.923+0000)
>...and will there be gangplank ?

_Looks at name_

Yup...checks out.
Zed using his actual Death Mark was wicked. Poor dude just imploded.
Yeah I thought it was cool to seen how his death mark would actually function
Have you watched the Rakan-Xayah video, Wild Magic? Zed uses his death mark there too, though it functions a little differently.
Rather have Swain instead but whatever Darius is more popular.
Same ;-;
omfg the way it shows the part of the skeletons before they die just gets me everytime. I DEMAND TO KNOW WHO MADE THIS

Hey Virtuoso.  Your demand has been granted.  This was my project here at Riot among other duties.  When they asked me to animate Zed kicking ass....I thought I was a kid waking up on Christmas morning.  I seriously had fun animating this.
I thought it was cool that we got a glimpse of Zed's real eyes.
{{champion:238}} Beat that Shen.

that was amazing so much better than the mf one everything flowed nice and it actually felt like zed while the mf one was choppy all over the place and just didn't look like mf at all. btw where did u get the link for this its unlisted

The mf one didn't have the so-called the in-betweens i beleive the name was 

The zed one does.
However the mf one did have a nice music it felt like an anime amv
Oh man, I hope we get one for my mains...
Shadow Fight 3
Really just want a Taliyah or Bard animation. They could have a calm, fluid style to their respective videos and I think Taliyah needs some love.
I love them. Can't wait for {{champion:99}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:43}}
Hax. I call hax. Shadows too op pls nerf

Zed= Madara Uchiha confirmed
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X1wVZ1lsqA8
I have mixed feelings tbh. Kinda hope Ahri doesn't get one, at least for a long while.
